summary: This document is an email chain from December 2018 discussing the collection of notes and documents related to meetings with Peter Skinner concerning Jeffrey Epstein. It references earlier emails from 2016 where Skinner shares news articles and legal updates about Epstein and the defamation case against Ghislaine Maxwell, and mentions Virginia Giuffre.

persons.name: Peter Skinner
persons.context: Appears to be an attorney involved in the Epstein case, sharing legal documents and news articles, and coordinating meetings.

persons.name: Virginia Giuffre
persons.context: Mentioned by Peter Skinner in a 2016 email as being included in the email chain; she is a central accuser in the Epstein case.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Referenced in relation to a defamation case against her; a motion to dismiss was denied by Judge Sweet.

persons.name: Judge Sweet
persons.context: Mentioned as the judge who denied Ghislaine Maxwell's motion to dismiss in the defamation case.

connections.description: Skinner includes Giuffre in an email chain and references her case, suggesting a legal representation or advisory relationship.
Skinner is sharing legal documents regarding a defamation case against Maxwell, indicating involvement in opposing legal proceedings.

events.title: Email follow-up on Epstein case notes
events.description: An email exchange where the sender offers to share a folder containing notes and documents from meetings with Peter Skinner related to Epstein.

events.title: Post report on Epstein's relationships
events.description: The New York Post reports on Jeffrey Epstein's continued relationships with young women, as referenced by Peter Skinner in an email.

events.title: Denial of Maxwell's motion to dismiss
events.description: Judge Sweet denies Ghislaine Maxwell's motion to dismiss in a defamation case, as noted in an email from Peter Skinner.

keyFacts: In December 2018, individuals were actively gathering notes and documents from meetings with attorney Peter Skinner concerning Jeffrey Epstein.
Peter Skinner, in 2016, shared a news article about Epstein's continued relationships with young women and provided updates on legal proceedings involving Ghislaine Maxwell.
Virginia Giuffre was included in a 2016 email chain by Peter Skinner, indicating her involvement in legal discussions related to the Epstein case.
A defamation case against Ghislaine Maxwell was progressing in February 2016, with a judge denying her motion to dismiss.
